Forge Strike.name: Forge Strike
Forge Strike.flavor: Brilliant flames erupt from your body, flashing with such intense heat that your enemies recoil.
Forge Strike.attack: Strength, Constitution, or Wisdom vs. AC
Forge Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, or Wisdom modifier damage.
Forge Strike.effect: Each creature adjacent to you takes 5 fire damage. Your square and each square adjacent to you fills with smoke until the start of your next turn. These squares are lightly obscured.

Burning Recollection.name: Burning Recollection
Burning Recollection.flavor: Although death closes on you, you recall the grudges you hold and gain strength from the fires of your hate.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You make a death saving throw

Effect: You automatically roll a 20 on the death saving throw.
Burning Recollection.trigger: You make a death saving throw
Burning Recollection.effect: You automatically roll a 20 on the death saving throw.

Form of the Forge Spirit.name: Form of the Forge Spirit
Form of the Forge Spirit.flavor: The wrongs done to you and your people causes fire to spill from you in a violent flood until all is ashes and ruin around you.
Form of the Forge Spirit.effect:
You assume the form of the forge spirit until the end of the encounter. While you are in this form, your melee attacks deal 5 extra fire damage.
Once during this encounter, you can use the Forge Spirit Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Forge Spirit.requirement: The power Form of the Forge Spirit must be active in order to use this power.
Form of the Forge Spirit.attack: Strength, Constitution, or Wisdom + 9 vs. Reflex
Form of the Forge Spirit.onHit: 3d10 + Strength, Constitution, or Wisdom modifier fire damage, you push the target 5 squares, and the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
Form of the Forge Spirit.onMiss: Half damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).
